org.apache.ignite.ml.environment

Interface LearningEnvironmentBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLearningEnvironmentBuilder

    public interface LearningEnvironmentBuilder
extends Serializable
    Builder of learning environment.
